mapper.sql:
SDITM_ID, SDITM_LNM, SDITM_PNM, LNM_CRI_DS, DMN_ID, DMNG_ID, INFOTP_ID, INFOTP_CHG_YN, ENC_YN, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, PERS_INFO_YN, DMN_PNM ,INFOTP_LNM,
,ALW_VAL,OWNR_ORG,ADMN_STND_CD,SAVE_FRM,EXPRSN_FRM,UNIT , PNM, STND_CD, SPCL_NT, BSNSS_FLD
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, B.INFOTP_LNM, B.DATA_TYPE, B.DATA_LEN, B.DATA_SCAL, (SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID and EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')) AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM, (SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.RQST_USER_ID and EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')) AS RQST_USER_NM, (SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.APRV_USER_ID and EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')) AS APRV_USER_NM FROM WAM_SDITM A JOIN WAM_DMN B ON A.INFOTP_LNM = B.INFOTP_LNM AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) FSQ -- MariaDB용 임시 Alias where SDITM_ID = #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into WAM_SDITM (SDITM_ID, SDITM_LNM, SDITM_PNM, LNM_CRI_DS, DMN_ID, DMNG_ID, INFOTP_ID, INFOTP_CHG_YN, ENC_YN, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, PERS_INFO_YN, STND_CD, SPCL_NT, BSNSS_FLD, PNM) values (#{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sditmLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sditmPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dmngId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infotpChgYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{encYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{persInfoYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stndCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spclNt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bsnssFld,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into WAM_SDITM
SDITM_ID,
SDITM_LNM,
SDITM_PNM,
LNM_CRI_DS,
DMN_ID,
DMNG_ID,
INFOTP_ID,
INFOTP_CHG_YN,

FRS_RQST_DTM,
FRS_RQST_USER_ID,
RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,
PERS_INFO_YN,
INFOTP_LNM,
ALW_VAL,
OWNR_ORG,
ADMN_STND_CD,
SAVE_FRM,
EXPRSN_FRM,
UNIT,
DATA_TYPE,
DATA_LEN,
DATA_SCAL,
ORG_NM ,
STND_CD,
SPCL_NT,
BSNSS_FLD,
PNM,

mapper.update:
update WAM_SDITM
SDITM_LNM = #{sditmLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SDITM_PNM = #{sditmPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LNM_CRI_DS = #{lnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMNG_ID = #{dmngId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INFOTP_ID = #{infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INFOTP_CHG_YN = #{infotpChgYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENC_YN = #{encYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INFOTP_LNM = #{infotpLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALW_VAL = #{alwVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OWNR_ORG = #{ownrOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADMN_STND_CD = #{admnStndCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SAVE_FRM = #{saveFrm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPRSN_FRM = #{exprsnFrm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_TYPE = UPPER(#{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),
DATA_LEN = #{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DATA_SCAL = #{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_NM = #{orgNm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STND_CD = #{stndCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPCL_NT = #{spclNt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BSNSS_FLD = #{bsnssFld,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PNM = #{pnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where SDITM_ID = #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT A.SDITM_ID , A.EXP_DTM , A.STR_DTM , A.SDITM_LNM , A.SDITM_PNM , A.LNM_CRI_DS , A.DMN_ID , A.DMNG_ID , A.INFOTP_ID , A.INFOTP_CHG_YN , IFNULL(A.ENC_YN, 'N') AS ENC_YN , A.RQST_NO , A.RQST_SNO , A.OBJ_DESCN , A.OBJ_VERS , A.REG_TYP_CD , A.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , A.RQST_DTM , A.RQST_USER_ID , A.PERS_INFO_YN , (SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.RQST_USER_ID and EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')) AS RQST_USER_NM , A.APRV_DTM , A.APRV_USER_ID , CASE WHEN A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') THEN '#FFBB00' ELSE NULL END AS FontColor , A.INFOTP_LNM, A.ALW_VAL, A.OWNR_ORG, A.ADMN_STND_CD FROM WAH_SDITM A WHERE A.SDITM_ID = #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY A.EXP_DTM DESC, A.STR_DTM DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE WAH_SDITM SET TRANS_YN = CASE WHEN #{transYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '1' THEN 'Y' WHEN #{transYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '0' THEN 'N' END WHERE SDITM_ID = #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
UPDATE WAM_SDITM A SET VRF_RMK = '미존재 영문약어명 존재. ' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD B WHERE CONCAT('_',A.SDITM_PNM,'_') LIKE CONCAT('%\_',B.STWD_PNM,'\_%') )

UPDATE WAM_SDITM A SET VRF_RMK = CONCAT(IFNULL(VRF_RMK,''),'형식단어(영문약어명) 미존재. ') WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD B WHERE CONCAT('_',A.SDITM_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%\_',B.STWD_PNM) AND B.ORG_NM = A.ORG_NM AND B.DMN_YN ='Y' )

UPDATE WAM_SDITM A SET VRF_RMK = CONCAT(IFNULL(VRF_RMK,''),'형식단어(용어명) 미존재.') WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STWD B WHERE A.SDITM_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%',B.STWD_LNM) AND B.ORG_NM = A.ORG_NM AND B.DMN_YN ='Y' )
UPDATE WAM_SDITM A SET VRF_RMK = NULL WHERE VRF_RMK IS NOT NULL
